00049 
00061   template<typename VecType>
00062   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b) const
00063   {
00064     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00065     return exp(-metric::EuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b) / bandwidth);
00066   }
00067 
00076   double Evaluate(const double t) const
00077   {
00078     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00079     return exp(-t / bandwidth);
00080   }
00081 
00083   double Bandwidth() const { return bandwidth; }
00085   double& Bandwidth() { return bandwidth; }

00089   {
